sen.e: Kagemoto KAGAWA (born on September 24, 1745 and passed away on October 23, 1821) was a poet of the middle of the Edo period.

sen.e: Although Kagemoto served for the Tokudaiji family, a court noble, at first, afterwards he devoted himself to the art of 'Waka' poetry.

sen.e: However, Kagemoto discontinued the adoption of Kageki, who Kagemoto thought was not qualified as a successor.

sen.e: Kagemoto adopted others and finally decided that Kagetsugu KAGAWA would be his successor.
